Package org.firmata4j.fsm

Class AbstractState

java.lang.Object
org.firmata4j.fsm.AbstractState
All Implemented Interfaces:
State
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParsingAnalogMappingState, ParsingAnalogMessageState, ParsingCapabilityResponseState, ParsingCustomSysexMessageState, ParsingDigitalMessageState, ParsingExtendedAnalogMessageState, ParsingFirmwareMessageState, ParsingI2CMessageState, ParsingStringMessageState, ParsingSysexMessageState, ParsingVersionMessageState, PinStateParsingState, WaitingForMessageState
public abstract class AbstractState extends Object implements State
This state stores FSM it belongs to. It facilitates transitions between states and buffering of the input data.
Author:
Oleg Kurbatov <o.v.kurbatov@gmail.com>
